data.message: My children and I are being harassed on our FB messenger and have been for almost a month now. This person has admitted on my private messenger that he is a stalker PLEASE SOMEONE HELP ME!!!!!

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Tammy. We're sorry you're experiencing this. Follow these steps to report an abusive message: http://bit.ly/2g6NqLD. -Joe

My FB messenger is deactivated my daughter in law just sent me a text where this RANDAL HICKMAN sent her a message today at 3:50 
The police have said they can't do anything since it's FB and the person only activates their account when they want to send a message
THIS SUCKS FB COULD DELETE THAT ACCOUNT IF YOU WANTED TO

THIS IS MESSAGE MY DAUGHTER IN LAW JUST RECEIVED AT 3:50 THIS AFTERNOON

He said "Won't be long now! LMAO LMAO LMAO LMAO"
James Mcghee we don't have the option to block them. Every time they post something they immediately deactivate their FB account and it has to be active to block it.
